alpha.title: Tweeten Alpha 10
alpha.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Build 10 to testers in the alpha update channel.

The update includes new improvements.

Here's what's new:

  • Lots and lots of bug fixes

beta.title: Tweeten Beta 1.5
beta.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Beta 1.5 to testers in the beta update channel. This update a major feature: spell check!

Here's what's new and improvements:

  • Spell check support for the following languages: English (United States), English (United Kingdom), English (Australia), English (Canada), English (South Africa), German (Germany), German (Austria), German (Switzerland), French, Spanish, Dutch (Netherlands), Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Italian, Ukrainian , Swedish (Sweden), Polish, Romanian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Czech, Danish, Greek, Estonian, Basque, Croatian, Hungarian, Lithuanian, Slovak , Slovenian, Turkish, and Vietnamese.
